name: Fallen
description: The actor has fallen to the ground in a messy or uncontrolled way (e.g., accident, violence).

activityMetadata.description: Inline metadata for activity description generation. Allows this component to define how it should be described in activity summaries without requiring a separate metadata component.

shouldDescribeInActivity.description: Whether this component should be included in activity descriptions. Set to false to hide from activity summaries.

template.description: Template string with placeholders: {actor} for the entity with this component. No target is referenced.

priority.description: Display priority for activity ordering. Higher values appear first. Range: 0-100. High priority (78) because a fallen actor is visually prominent and typically urgent.
